titleStmt.title: Sundry particulars concerning bishops humbly offered to the consideration of this honourable Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Brabourne, Theophilus, b. 1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold by William Nowell, bookseller in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
